Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $15000. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
